name: SPACE_S
description:
Spaces are the early pioneers of the modern coliving revolution. Our residents become part of our global community and enjoy a huge range of member benefits and services. The ultimate goal of it all is to provide total FREEDOM TO LIVE for our residents. We free you from the hassles of day-to-day living, so you can focus on what's important to you: enjoying your limited time on earth.

Our asset management and development arm creates beautifully curated coliving residences in purpose-designed buildings. We work with private and institutional investors to actively acquire sites for development and operation, through purchase, lease or management.

The operational arm of Spaces is a technology platform that works with any kind of asset, across the spectrum. From individual apartments and townhouses, to residential blocks, to our own purpose designed buildings, the Spaces platform brings them under one umbrella with our living brand, providing a suite of choices for our residents.

team.name: Shazz Bhunnoo
team.bioHtml: Founder @SPACE_S • Worked at @Deutsche Bank

team.title: Founder
team.name: Shazz Bhunnoo
team.bioHtml: Founder @SPACE_S • Worked at @Deutsche Bank

jobs.title: Experienced Lettings Negotiator
jobs.description:
Hi, I’m Shazz, the Founder & CEO of Spaces.

Spaces is an experienced, professional rental operator. We make finding a home as easy as booking a hotel. We do this by leasing properties directly from owners and transforming them into Spaces homes. Our renters receive great quality, all-inclusive rentals with amazing customer service.

We are now scaling across London. We currently have six live communities and over 1,700 homes in our pipeline. So we’re now inviting passionate and talented people to join our family!

THE ROLE

We are currently selecting an experienced lettings negotiator to join our team.

You will be selling the unique Spaces living experience, which includes:

All-inclusive and affordable rents
24/7 ongoing support and hospitality
Fast, efficient instant online renting
Bespoke technology that optimises the whole process
Curated community and social events for our members
Your main responsibilities will include:

Delivering outstanding online property tours
Managing your pipeline and being relentless in closing leads
Offering high-quality property viewings in person
Achieving weekly sales targets, keeping your colleagues and management abreast of progress
Management of stock and web listings
Helping tenants through their screening process tenancies
Your base salary will be agreed depending on your level of experience with a commission structure directly linked to your sales performance. Your total OTE earnings can reach up to £40K in your first year.

OUR EXPECTATIONS

At Spaces we strive to be the best in what we do and expect our employees to live by this mantra. Therefore, If you can commit to and live by the following principles then you are the type of person who will be successful and help our company thrive.

Read more and watch our About Us video here:

https://spaceslife.com/_S/about-spaces

If you feel that this level of engagement is not right for you or your not that you're willing to participate at this level, we're not a good fit for you.

Our expectation is that you will take the steps necessary to do what you say you're going to do and be accountable for your actions. In other words, live above the line.

We understand that not every person is ready for this level of performance and we appreciate the honesty of those who decide that this is not the right place for them.

On the other hand you would make an ideal candidate to join our company if you're willing to commit to the following above the line principles.

Accountability. See it, own it, solve it, do it.
Become part of the solution.
Respect for others feelings
Act now
Ask the question, what else can I do?
Ask the questions, what coaching do you have for me? What can I do better?
Personal ownership and pride.
Reject average.
Show others that you care.

PERKS OF WORKING AT SPACES

You’ll receive a whole range of awesome perks and benefits as part of the Spaces team, including our health & wellness package which gives you:

24/7 confidential employee help and advice line for health and welfare
Exclusive special rates on dental care and health insurance
Free online workout and wellness classes
Massive savings on gyms nationwide
Preferential discounts at healthy and organic food retailers
In addition, we also provide a huge range of discounts and benefits on lifestyle services to help your budget work harder for you:

Massive discounts on your mobile bill
Exclusive savings with Apple
Discounts on brand-name services from food and drink to retail and travel
Access to over a thousand e-learning modules and courses
Super cheap cinema tickets, available any day of the week
And if that’s not enough, remember:

You’ll be part of an experienced team making a real impact on our members’ lives
You’ll have direct one-to-one time with the Founder & CEO
You’ll be immersed in a growing, entrepreneurial startup environment
Thanks for taking the time to read about this opportunity with Spaces! I hope you are excited by our vision and can see yourself becoming part of our team. Apply now and help us transform the future of renting!

Hope to see you soon,

Shazz Bhunnoo

Founder & CEO
